message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. Given its value and potential, I believe a starting price of $1,600,000 is fair. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Bob, I understand your perspective.  While that price doesn't quite reflect the true value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $1,450,000. I believe this revised offer represents a fair compromise.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you at $1,300,000, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. Can you meet me in the middle again?
